segments.text: I think it’s funny how the woman is so absorbed in drying that plate, completely missing everything else.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is overflowing, and she’s just standing there, polishing away.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The kids are sneaking cookies, and she has no idea—it’s kind of adorable.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is stretching so far, balancing on that wobbly stool, and he’s still determined to get those cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is just standing there, waiting for her share, looking so hopeful.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if they’ve done this before, sneaking treats when the woman isn’t looking.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The whole scene is chaotic, but it’s also kind of sweet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope they get away with it—it’s a fun little moment for them.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is so focused on her task, she doesn’t even notice the mess around her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t help but smile at how carefree the kids are.
segments.speaker: PAR
